ReviewText: The product is great and works perfectly.
Very disappointed, it stopped working after a few days.
Excellent customer service and fast delivery.
The quality is poor, I would not recommend it.
Easy to use and very useful.
The material feels cheap and is easy to damage.
Exceeded my expectations, I am very satisfied.
It broke after only one month of use.
Super product, will buy it again.
Always happy to do it again.
